reference: Berry (1994), Estimating Discrete-Choice Models of Product Differentiation, RAND Journal of Economics, 25(2), 242-262. Berry, Levinsohn and Pakes (1995), Automobile Prices in Market Equilibrium, Econometrica, 63(4), 841-890.

Hansen, L.P. (1982) Large Sample Properties of Generalized Method of Moments Estimators, Econometrica, 50, 1029-1054.
